itunes:title: S3, E5: Intentional Conversations: Courtney DeFeo
title: S3, E5: Intentional Conversations: Courtney DeFeo
itunes:author: That Sounds Fun Network
itunes:subtitle: How to Give as a Family at Christmas
itunes:summary:
The Raising Boys & Girls podcast is back with bonus episodes to help you finish 2020 strong! Join Sissy Goff and David Thomas this week as they talk with author, speaker, and creator of Light 'Em Up Acts, Courtney DeFeo, on simple ways you can give as a family this Christmas.

Grab links, stats, and quotes you want to remember in the show notes at https://www.gominno.com/blog/raising-boys-and-girls-podcast-courtney-defeo-interview

Connect with Sissy, David, and Melissa at raisingboysandgirls.com

Connect with Minno at podcast.gominno.com
